de.bkroeger.myvisio.controller

Class WorksheetTabController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bkroeger.myvisio.controller.AbstractController
      • de.bkroeger.myvisio.controller.BaseController
        • de.bkroeger.myvisio.controller.WorksheetTabController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class WorksheetTabController
extends BaseController

    Dieser Controller steuert die TabView der Worksheets eines Workbook.

    Author:
    bks
